citations.narrative:
During inspection it was found that the food bin in the smaller kennel building had a buildup of crushed food on the back
portion of the rim. The crushed food was blacked and smelled slightly moldy. Having molded food on the rim of the food
bin risks contamination of the food and possible illness for the dogs. Food must be uncontaminated, wholesome, and
palatable.
Correction date: February 23rd, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.9(a) 
   
Feeding 
During inspection it was found that the food bin in the smaller kennel building had a buildup of crushed food on the back 
portion of the rim. The crushed food was blacked and smelled slightly moldy. Having molded food on the rim of the food 
bin risks contamination of the food and possible illness for the dogs. Food must be uncontaminated, wholesome, and 
palatable.  
Correction date: February 23rd, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
